title: Define Project Scope and Goals
description: Define the specific objectives and boundaries of the project, including what it aims to achieve and what resources will be required.

title: Design BCI Platform Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the BCI platform, including hardware, software, and network requirements.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Design and implement the user interface for the BCI platform, ensuring it is intuitive and easy to use.

title: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing
description: Develop the backend services necessary for processing user data and providing insights to users.

title: Set Up Database and Data Storage Solutions
description: Choose and configure a database solution to store user data securely.

title: Integrate DevOps Practices for Continuous Deployment
description: Implement DevOps practices to streamline the development, testing, and deployment of the BCI platform.

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing on the Platform
description: Test the BCI platform to ensure it functions as intended and that there are no critical bugs or errors.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend Services for Data Processing

title: Conduct Security Audit of the Platform
description: Perform a thorough security audit of the BCI platform to identify and address any potential vulnerabilities.
dependencies: Set Up Database and Data Storage Solutions
Integrate DevOps Practices for Continuous Deployment

title: Write Technical Documentation for the Platform
description: Create comprehensive technical documentation for developers, users, and administrators.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend Services for Data Processing
